member.name: P:Cosmos.EntityFrameworkCore.EfCoreAutoHistoryOptions.ChangedMaxLength
member.summary: The maximum length of the 'Changed' column. null will use default setting 2048 unless ChangedVarcharMax is true in which case the column will be varchar(max). Default: null.

member.name: P:Cosmos.EntityFrameworkCore.EfCoreAutoHistoryOptions.LimitChangedLength
member.summary: Set this to true to enforce ChangedMaxLength. If this is false, ChangedMaxLength will be ignored. Default: true.

member.name: P:Cosmos.EntityFrameworkCore.EfCoreAutoHistoryOptions.RowIdMaxLength
member.summary: The max length for the row id column. Default: 50.

member.name: P:Cosmos.EntityFrameworkCore.EfCoreAutoHistoryOptions.TableMaxLength
member.summary: The max length for the table column. Default: 128.

member.name: M:Cosmos.EntityFrameworkCore.Map.CosmosModelBuilderExtensions.EnableAutoHistory(Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.ModelBuilder,System.Nullable{System.Int32})
member.summary: Enables the automatic recording change history.
member.param: The to enable auto history feature.
The maximum length of the 'Changed' column. null will use default setting 2048.
member.returns: The had enabled auto history feature.

member.summary: Set this to true to enforce ChangedMaxLength. If this is false, ChangedMaxLength will be ignored. Default: true.
